summary: A player house that requires Hearthfires DLC.
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to Legacy Manor! The ORIGINAL Legacy Manor! This is my 3rd house mod (and certainly my best). This house mod is similar to my 1st mod in that it is[b][i]intended for replaying characters[/i][/b]that give a big boost to starting out. You will find ingots, disenchantables and alchemy goodies. There are also Vendors and Trainers located inside as well. You'll also find Vampire and Werewolf support... somewhere. There's also ritual stones and blessing stones and even a mean ghost you can fight in the crypt. 

[b][i]This mod requires Hearthfire DLC[/i][/b]
Don't have Hearthfires DLC? [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=358151058]click here [/url]for the Vanilla version. 

[img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/82802931/LegendarySeparator.png[/img] 

[b][i]Merchant Types:[/i][/b]
Mage 
Fighter 
Thief 
Bartender (he seems familiar to me) 

[img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/82802931/LegendarySeparator.png[/img] 


[b][i]Trainer Types:[/i][/b]
Illusion Master 
Speechcraft Master 
Destruction Master 
Lockpicking Master 

[img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/82802931/LegendarySeparator.png[/img] 


[b][i]Goodies to be found:[/i][/b]
Enchanting Table 
Alchemy Table 
Cooking Pot 
Blacksmithing Workshop 
Vampire Cattle 
Wood Chopping 
Smelter 
Ghostly Follower 
Taxi (Carriage Driver) 
Pottable Plant Garden 

[img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/82802931/LegendarySeparator.png[/img] 


[b][i]Versions:[/i][/b]
V1.0 - Uploaded mod 
V1.1 - Uploaded bug fixes and color changes 
V1.2 - bug fixes and various visual changes 

[img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/82802931/LegendarySeparator.png[/img] 


[b][i]Possible Bugs / Conflicts:[/i][/b]
DO NOT USE BOTH VANILLA AND HEARTHFIRE LEGACY MANOR MODS. They will work but the results are undesirable. 

The Crypt door sometimes will not open Let me know if this happens. (console command coc aaalegacymanorbasement) 

The vampire cattle somtimes is not sleeping. Let me know if this happens. 

The game can crash if you summon a bound weapon during the Lloyd fight int he crypt. Let me know if this happens. 


[img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/82802931/LegendarySeparator.png[/img] 


[b][i]F.A.Q.s:[/i][/b] 

Q. Where is Legacy Manor? 
A. You will find the manor near Falkreath Hold. You can also find it via map marker just west of the Falkreath marker if you need to fast travel to it. 

Q. Does this mod require DLCs? 
A. Yes, this mod requires Hearthfire DLC. If you do not have Hearthfire you should use my other Legacy Manor Vanilla Edition in my workshop. 

Q. Where are the keys? 
A. You'll have to battle Lloyd in the crypt for one key.
author: Owlburgers
